name: Bengal Tiger (ベンガルトラ)
description:
An illustration of The Bengal Tiger (ベンガルトラ) in Japanese ink painting style or sumi-e. Sumi-e is commonly described as art done in monochrome, with the use of sumi ink and handmade paper: Sumi-e means black ink painting (sumi 墨 = black ink, e 絵 = painting).

JPEG file, 4167x5833 pixels, 300dpi sRGB ©2022
